title.rendered: Apple Lightning to USB Cable (2 m)

content.rendered:
This 2-metre USB 2.0 cable connects your iPhone, iPad or iPod with Lightning connector to your laptop’s USB port for syncing and charging.
Or you’ll be able to join to the Apple USB Power Adapter for handy charging from an influence level.
Compatibility iPhone: all iPhone after iPhone 5.
Compatibility iPad: iPad Pro 12.9-inch (1st and 2nd era), iPad Pro 10.5-inch, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, iPad (fifth, sixth and seventh era), iPad Air (third era), iPad Air 2, iPad Air (1st era), iPad mini (fifth era), iPad mini 4, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 2, iPad mini (1st era)
Compatibility MacEbook: MacEbook Air (13-inch, Early 2015–2017), MacEbook Air (11-inch, Early 2015), MacEbook Pro (Retina, 13-inch, Late 2012–2015),MacEbook Pro (Retina, 15-inch, Mid 2012–2015)
Compatibility Mac: iMac (Retina 5K, 27-inch, 2020), iMac (Retina 4K, 21.5-inch, 2019), iMac (Retina 5K, 27-inch, 2019), iMac (Retina 4K, 21.5-inch, 2017), iMac (Retina 5K, 27-inch, 2017), iMac (Retina 4K, 21.5-inch, Late 2015), iMac (Retina 5K, 27-inch, Late 2014–2015)
Compatibility Mac Pro: iMac Pro (2017 and later), Mac Pro (2019), Mac Pro (Late 2013)
Compatibility Mac mini: Mac mini (M1, 2020)

excerpt.rendered:
This 2-metre USB 2.0 cable connects your iPhone, iPad or iPod with Lightning connector to your computer’s USB port for syncing and charging.
Or you can connect to the Apple USB Power Adapter for convenient charging from a power point.
Compatibility iPhone: all iPhone after iPhone 5.
